short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Match titles from Amazon with those available through your library and hoopla digital.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Match titles from Amazon with those available through your library and hoopla digital. You'll need a library card from a participating library as well as a free account from hoopladigital.com. Match data displays directly in Amazon web page to remind you of resources available from your library.
